summary: An ordinance granting the Sicks' Seattle Brewing and Malting Company, its successors and assigns, the right to construct, maintain and operate until December 31, 1978, an overhead conveyor bridge for conveying goods, wares and merchandise together with a pedestrian corridor in connection therewith across Airport Way in the vicinity of Hanford Street; specifying the conditions of such grant; and providing for the filing by said company of an acceptance, together with a surety company bond and a public liability insurance policy.
